meanings.definition: The action or process of instigating or provoking something.
meanings.sent1: Her instigation led to a heated argument among friends.
meanings.sent2: The instigation of the fight was a simple misunderstanding.
meanings.sent3: His instigation of a water balloon fight caught everyone by surprise.
meanings.sent4: The instigation of change can sometimes be met with resistance.
meanings.sent5: The instigation of the plan brought about unexpected consequences.

meanings.definition: An act or instance of instigating or inciting someone to do something.
meanings.sent1: The instigation of the rebellion sparked a revolution.
meanings.sent2: Her instigation of the prank caused laughter among her friends.
meanings.sent3: His instigation of a dance-off at the party was a hit.
meanings.sent4: The instigation of creativity can lead to amazing discoveries.
meanings.sent5: The instigation of kindness can create a ripple effect of positivity.
